subject.normal: Why ther are so many services (osgi:ls) but no bundles (osgi:list) ?

body.para: Hi, I am wondering why there are so many services (osgi:ls) but no bundles (osgi:list) when I start to use Karaf after installing it? There should be many bundles providing these services?
